OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: This IP sends notification once bulk adjustments are applied
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: ESM_BulkApplyAdjustmentsToLineItemsFinishProcess

omniProcessElements.name: sendFailureNotification
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "body" : "Price adjustment wasn't applied to the selected products. Try again or ask your Salesforce admin for help.", "customNotificationTypeName" : "ESMNotifications", "targetID" : "%additionalData:cartId%", "title" : "Bulk price adjustment wasn't completed", "userID" : "%additionalData:userId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "NOT(ISBLANK(%itemsProcessed:failed%))", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_SendAppNotification", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction1", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: sendSuccessNotification
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "body" : "Price adjustment was applied to the selected products.", "customNotificationTypeName" : "ESMNotifications", "targetID" : "%additionalData:cartId%", "title" : "Bulk price adjustment was completed", "userID" : "%additionalData:userId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "ISBLANK(%itemsProcessed:failed%)", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_SendAppNotification", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction1", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

OmniIntegrationProcedure.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "chainableActualTimeLimit" : null, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableDMLRowsLimit" : null, "chainableDMLStatementsLimit" : null, "chainableHeapSizeLimit" : null, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "chainableQueryRowsLimit" : null, "chainableSoslQueriesLimit" : null, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "description" : "", "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "labelPlural" : "", "labelSingular" : "", "linkToExternalObject" : "", "mockResponseMap" : { }, "nameColumn" : "", "queueableChainableCpuLimit" : 40000, "queueableChainableHeapSizeLimit" : 6, "queueableChainableQueriesLimit" : 120, "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "rollbackOnError" : false, "trackingCustomData" : { }, "ttlMinutes" : 5 }
